title.narrative: North-South Road Corridor Investment Program - Tranche 1

description.narrative: The project impact will be aligned with efficient, safe, and sustainable transport on the north-south road corridor. Its expected output is an approximately 10 km four-lane road between Yerevan and Ashtarak.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Reconstructed Yerevan to Ashtarak Road with increased traffic volume is safe and efficiently operated

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
MOTC's institutional capacity improved for sustained maintenance of road and safety to 10 (on 0-10 scale) in 2016 from 3 in 2008

description.narrative: Reconstructed Yerevan to Ashtarak Road with increased traffic volume is safe and efficiently operated

title.narrative: Annual road maintenance budget increased to 5% in 2016 for inflation from 3% in 2008

description.narrative: Reconstructed Yerevan to Ashtarak Road with increased traffic volume is safe and efficiently operated
